about_the_game:
Help support Mission X Games by donating here -

-You, Youtuber James Pink, go into a haunted orphanage in order to get footage for your upcoming video. You are faced with paranormal activity in the orphanage while recording your footage.

Night 1 - In night one, you must avoid the bald lady sprinting around the hallway. You do this by going into rooms, but you cannot stay in one room forever. Overtime you will start to hear screams louder and louder until you get jumpscared by the spirit of the baby

Night 2- Night one + you can now only go into rooms with the lights off. Every 25 seconds the rooms that are off are switched

Night 3 - Night 2 + there is now a children’s teddy bear that follows you and only stops when you look at and then continues after you look away

Endless Night! - Try to beat your high score in Endless Night! The Difficulty is about double Night 3's difficulty

Retro mode! - Switch on retro mode to play the game with a retro/pixelated effect!
